name: The Rains Came
description: The Rains Came is a movie starring Myrna Loy, Tyrone Power, and George Brent. In India, a married British aristocrat is reunited with an old flame, but she truly has her sights set on a handsome surgeon.

review.name: First film experience.
review.reviewBody: I was eight years old when I saw this movie. It was the first movie I remember seeing. My mother says that initially I refused to go into the movie theater because it was a dark, and to me, forbidding place. Once inside, however, I didn't want to leave. I have never seen the movie since, but the images of flooding and sick people under mosquito nets are as vivid to me as if I had seen it yesterday. I also have memories of being put through an emotional wringer by the film, thinking it was "real" and crying at the death and destruction it portrayed. The total effect was to hook me on movies for good and I could hardly wait to get back into that dark, engrossing place.
